name: Dry Skin
description: The skin of this Pokemon will need special care, constant hydration and protection against heat.
effect: If Rain Weather is in effect the User recovers 1 HP at the end of each Round. If Sunny Weather is in effect, the User receives 1 damage at the end the Round. Water attacks heal 1 HP to this Pokemon instead of dealing damage. Fire attacks will deal 1 additional Damage to this Pokemon.
